content.detailedDescription:
Looking at stars from driveway in front of the house just around midnight. looking at the southern sky we both pointed to a very fast moving object in the sky, not directly overhead but at about 80-85 degrees from the horizon. object looked like a satellite or star in its brightness but speed and direction made it stand out. very fast moving and moved from east to west across the southern sky. as it was nearly overhead it came to a full stop and to our amazement it backed up for a short distance, then turned and continued west at a speed about double the original speed. the path it followed was a sharp arc toward the horizon. it vanished from sight in the western sky, about 45 degrees above the horizon.

one of the two observers is a pilot and he noticed that it was moving the wrong direction (e to w) to be a satellite and that is what caught his attention. i noticed it due to the speed being far to fast for it to be an airplane. also, the light was constant - not flashing as airplane lights often are.

sky had a light haze tonight but all stars and planets in the southern sky were quite clear. sky in that area was clearer than to the east and north east.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: E to w in southern sky, stopped, reversed direction, turned and continued west

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed red lights in the sky, triangular formation that changed in a second. i took video with my phone and it can all be seen on a big screen
content.summary: Came down with changing movements

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard on may 12, 2017 looking west from my backyard then started taking photos. i put my camera setting on continuous. i did not hear or see any objects with my naked eye. there were no airplanes in the area at the time. i was looking west at the time the photos were taken.
it must've been approx. around 8pm when i was taking photos. when loading my photos into iphoto on my mac computer is when i saw these three photos of this green object. i was shocked. i couldn't believe i caught something like this. it was an awesome feeling. another one to add to my large collection. i was the only one out taking photo's. it was a very beautiful clear night.  i used my nikon d3300. 

          thank you.
content.summary: I was taking photos and i put it on continuous i captured three photos of this green object. i did not see it until i looked at my photos on the computer.

content.detailedDescription: confidential. spotted a military grade traingular craft silently cruising the sky northbound just after sunset and all other planes had passed over. it  moved at a consistent speed in relation to the others jets at sunset just slightly faster and lower. it had three lights 2 flashing the north light and the west. the east light was solid. after looking at it i noticed a tiny but easily seen lit up dot up in front to the n/ne and miles upon miles above. my assumption was the military plane was tracking something moving much smoother and faster across the sky. the military jet made it accross the sky in about 1-2 mins. this object made it from directly above me to out of sight in approx 20sec. the only reason i spotted it was becausd i was watching the 1st plane. it was like a weak dot on a page. i almost lost site of it the entire time it was scaling the nighg sky. had it bbeen a satellite i wouldn't have reported but i dont believe they take >1min to cross.
content.summary: Military secret or ?

content.detailedDescription: I was at centennial park on harrison & beverly with friends having a picnic and waiting for the fireworks to start. i was taking picture of the our group and started to walk around with my camera. looking up i saw what i thought was a plane banking, then i realized it was making a loop. i snapped a few pictures of the object. and when i got home i was shocked to see there were no wings on the object and it was leaving a fire trail, i don't know of any planes that do that. i live by kennedy space center for 5 years and saw many rockets taking off, but none on an angle like this one. the object had 2 white sections and 2 thin brown ones. i've sent these picture to a few different places asking to help identify the object, but received no responses to date. please contact me at my address, or phone........I'm stumped!!! let me explain the photos i am sending you --- the first 4 are as i shot them, the other 3 are enlarged and slightly enhanced. i'm not a professional, all i used was what i have on my basic computer photo lab system
content.summary: Waiting for fireworks to start on the 4th i saw what i thought was a plane making a loop until i noticed no wings & leaving a fire trail

content.detailedDescription: Bright orange lights like firy orbs moving in a straight flight path from north to south. thought they may have been jets at first because they were moving moderately fast like a 747 but didn't make noise. glying about 100 meters in the air.
content.summary: Orange lights flying fast in straight line from north to south.

content.detailedDescription: The four of us were sitting in the hot tub and observed an unusual orange fireball fall from the nw sky.  it was a clear starlit night.  we all got out of the tub and walked on the lawn to watch this object.  it looked like it was going to fall to the ground but stopped and leveled out.  it had a very bright orange glow that was constant.  it traveled slowly away from us towards walpole island and the american border.
content.summary: A fiery orange ball falling from the sky then stopped above treeline seemed under control then went sw straightline

content.detailedDescription: Me and two friends was out on the rocky pier in new buffalo, mi.. we was able to see the lights from chicago, so just watching them we was able to see other lights that looked like planes at first but the they changed direction in a vertical way. then we all started watching just the lights in the air above chicago. that's when i decided to flick my lighter to signal them. then one of the lights zoomed from chicago to above us in seconds and had a spot light on us. we then crawled down into the rocks being scared. after a minute or two the object went farther east and we all ran from the rocks of the pier. the object was gone. we did see the object and looked like a big triangle an was like looking at an engine of a car with a cigarette lighter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched lights on lake michigan

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday may 03, 2017, traveling to pick up my wife from work, east on north 215 highway and between lamb blvd and range road (north las vegas, nv)there are no street lights. at 11:48 pm driving with my driver side window down, a very large solid bright white light appeared straight down above me and illuminated the stretch of land between both sides of the highway, to include the west bound side of north 215 highway. i first thought this could be a police helicopter with a spotlight, but i was the only vehicle traveling and the light covered a huge area, and the sound of the aircraft was not a helicopter, there was no sound from above!!The light remained solid for 5 to 7 seconds as i was traveling, difficult to say if the light was traveling with me or i was traveling through the light. when the light was gone , i then heard a soft smooth swoosh sound as it accelerated to the east. when i was on top of the bridge before range road, i could see four lights 2 solid (on bottom) white and 2 flashing red (on top)(difficult to say if this was one or two ufo's). the ufo(s) appeared to have slowed down at the north end of nellis air force base and i believe i saw a helicopter at the far south end of nellis air force base. the ufo(s) continued traveling eastward over the mountain ridge away from the air base.

i could not explain what type of aircraft this was when it happened in real time. i was telling my wife that since we are close to area 51 this has to be a top secret aircraft. 

on the weekend, it was reported on the news a ufo was sighted over paris, france and a picture was shown on television. the solid light shape from that ufo was the same as what i saw when i was driving.

so know i am uncertain as to exactly what i saw and experienced that night.
content.summary: Looks like same ufo spotted in paris france a couple days later

content.detailedDescription: I was watching from my door a strip of light hovered then brock up into bits hovered then faded came back some were else it was a white strip faded then went back to normal weird it was very unsettling and made me feel uneesy never seen anything like it
content.summary: A strip of light that brock up into strips then hovered then faded

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just purchased a banshee atv in 2001 and our neighbor invited us up to the cinders in flagstaff to camp/ride.  we got there late on friday, just before sunset.  we drove around trying to find our friend among all the people camped, but couldn't find him and the sun started to go down so we chose a spot outside the last of the other campers.  while i was pitching the tent and setting up, i noticed a bright (star) between two tall pine trees.  a little later i glanced up again and it had moved maybe a foot, but then later when i glanced up again at it, i noticed it had moved a foot upward and in a non-linear direction from the first two views so i knew that was not right and went to the truck and got my binoculars out for a closer view.  to begin with, it caught my eye due to it being so bright and seemingly close, but had initially just dismissed it as being the north star.  so when i looked through the binoculars, i couldn't focus well so i went to a nearby tree with a branch and steadied the binoculars.  it was not quite dark yet.  when i focused, i couldn't believe it.  i called my wife over and told her to pinch me and tell me i'm not seeing what i saw.  she looked through and saw the same.  what we saw was points of light connected by beams of light.  it was irregular in shape and was slowly rotating around.  the best way i can describe it, is if you remember the old wooden erector set toys and connected wooden balls with the sticks and made an irregular object all connected and began rotating it around.  it was transparent as you could see through it to the points of light and beams of light on the other side as they rotated around to the front.  after looking for just a few minutes, i suggested we jump on the quad (atv) and get a closer look.  so we doubled up and drove towards it through the forest of the cinders.  while driving the sun had gone down so i flipped the lights on and kept driving towards it.  we must have gone just about two miles and then all of a sudden it took off in the opposite direction in a instant and appeared to just stop way out on the horizon.  at this point, it seemed futile to drive any further so we stopped and i picked up the binoculars and tried to view it again, but could only make out the glow of it that i had seen from my naked eye to begin with.  at this point, we decided to return back to camp.  (i just saw the show 'ancient aliens' on the history channel and they mentioned mufon - so looked it up and decided it was time to share our story with the wider audience in case someone else saw the same thing at that time).
content.summary: Ufo sighting in flagstaff az, cinders on may 25, 2001 (memorial day weekend)

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in 1983, in february. i was a candidate for the executive chef job, part of the executive management team being hired to open a hotel in riyadh, saudi arabia, for the king. the interview was to be in the morning, at the hilton hotel on singer island, where they put us up for the night. i was sharing my room with the food and beverage director candidate, who i'll call mr. x, from boston. we arrived at the hotel late evening. mr x had a dinner engagement and went on his way. i decided to walk down the beach and see what's to eat and happening. i found a resort bar/grille open with some entertainment and so i ordered a steak sandwich and a beer. i ate the sandwich but half way through the beer i stopped because i felt a tiny bit of a buzz.....And didn't want any glitches for the interview in the am, so i left half. i walked back up the, probably about a 1/2 mile walk and when i arrived at the hotel, my roomy wasn't there so i sat on the beach, staring at the ocean, thinking about the am interview.

then i saw it. i saw what i first thought was one of those search lights crossing the sky....And i thought that odd.....Maybe they're searching for something way out thyere....This was on the horizon. 
the light wasn't swinging up or down though and so i watched it. the beam of light broke off of the horizon and was flying by itself towards land....Directly west.....Well, directly perpendicular to land anyway...Since i don't know the exact north/south orientation of that beach.
as the beam drew closer to land it resolved from a glowing beam into individual disks, flying in some sort of formation. there were abour six or eight large disks and about forth small ones. at first the formation seemed like a bunch,....Kind of a thick formation that all of a sudden changed to this shape as they approached land. the large disks were flying at the points with about five smaller ships within the formation.They switched quickly into this formation as they did a 90Â° turn south. i saw a smaller one moving through the formation and seemingly enter a larger one. their shape was a disk, they were nearly completely round when overhead but more ovoid before that. as they passed over i could see stars through their formation. their two sizes were both larger than the stars but smaller than an aspirin. the smaller ones were about three times the size of the stars and the larger maybe....20 stars or larger...
as i watched them, with my stomach heaving and my heart pumping awfully fast, i heard mr x return to the room....The door was open the the room and i was only about 20 feet from the door. i shouted and he came as fast as he could but when he arrived the disks had just traveled far enough south that they turned back into a beam of light.
i realized that what i was seeing, light-wise was the reflection of the sun, on the bottoms of the disks (saucers). i suppose one could do the math and estimate their minimum height for them to be able to reflect the suns light onto singer island at 1 am in february of '83. to me they seemed to be in space.....Absolutely not in our atmosphere. there was no noise, their was no vapor trail or otherwise.
in closing, i was as clear headed that night, for the interview in the am.....As any time in my life...Can you imagine? exec chef for the king of saudi arabia? after the first year on the job, it was on to all the best cities in the world for hotel starts...What a job! and we were all hired...
but never went. the king had a change of political heart and decided the jobs were better done by countrymen.
here's the thing. i've lived with this eating my heart out since then. please answer my input!
since then, i've seen on the science/history channels....Your shows...The one about president reagan having his fleet of 8 large oblong space crafts and 43 smaller crafts. this is tearing me up....Because what i saw were not oblong. but hearing nothing about it since 1983 has me so anxious to know more.It drew many tears just writing this to you so please don't let me down.
brian donovan
content.summary: 40 to 50 disks outside our atmosphere (seemingly) flew from the horizon west to the coast then south.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up that morning and i decided to get an early start of the day to water the plants before the morning star get hotter. as i was doing my watering i ask my wife what time it was in order to get something to eat. she said 7 am, i look up to the sky to think where should i go for breakfast and notice this slow moving cylinder shape object coming from the direction of the airport (miami int. airport). i called my wife for the phone but she was busy with the kids and all for school. i could not move for not to lose track of this object. so, i kept a close eye on it and somehow it saw what i was doing it flew straight up in the air like 500 to 600 hundred feet in the air. with out a sound and without any traces of smoke or engines on this craft it was so clear and clean and a bright color of clear silver(not see through).This craft and i where just there and it felt like forever. as it was over my head it started to spin so fast that these colors of chrome; hot red; clear bright white and yellow came off of this craft. i then could not move even if i wanted to. these colors where almost touching me. i some how ran in side the house to call the police and as i was pressing the numbers 91- it some how knew what i was doing and flew away. i looked at the phone and it was 7:30 am. 
(i did call, because it could be another country doing what country do to each other and that is spying on each other).
the next day i woke up even earlier to prove to myself something. as i was just for and hour looking up in the sky. i felt something looking at me. as my body turn me to the direction of this small sphere that flew like motionless and without sound and had a color of its surrounding not so much of hiding but reflecting the outdoor. it had me pulling out my pocket knife because i did not feel safe. and it just hovered there and after a while it flew away like a balloon. (not floppy and not all over the air but like how a balloon floating away up in the air slow motion. (both time the objects flew up into the air without a sound).
content.summary: This is not the first time i see an event like this.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from mother-in-laws house.  for some reason i wanted to take a picture of the sun setting as we were driving home.  i got my iphone out and started taking pictures...After the first picture i realized it wasn't time for the sun to set.  later, when i got home i decided to post a few of them on my facebook page, i do this a lot for my friends who live  in other countries.  when i got a good look at 3 of the pictures i noticed this green glowing object.  it was in three of my pictures around the same area in each pic. my husband and i were slowing down from a red light which turned green as i took the pics. i saw that the color of the green was close to the color of the street light when i started to check them out.  but, the green glowing object was separate from the light and much higher in the sky.  i posted them and even mentioned the green glowing ufo.  the shape reminded me of a yo-yo, or a object with a green band around it.  the object seemed to change position and direction. i was sure it was something very unusual because of how it glowed and moved.
content.summary: Green glowing object - shape of a yo-yo / saturn shape - with a band around the middle.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were going fishing. we stopped at a store on the way. when we left we went about a half mile and then we were instantly transported 9 miles down the road. i know it was nine miles because the sign we noticed said 9 miles from the small town we just left. both my brother and i were confused as to what had happened to us. we never made it to the turn where we were going fishing we were instantly 9 miles down the road. we did not experience any aliens or ufo. we were just instantly transported down the road. my brother asked me didn't we just leave the store and i thought the same thing. he also asked me what we were talking about and i could not tell him. he just asked me to not talk about what had happened  out of fear people would think we were crazy. he does not like to talk about it.
content.summary: Transported 9 miles instantly.

content.detailedDescription: While on watch aboard naval ship ddg15 between midnight and 4am near midway island as port watch i observed several lights far off above the horizon 3to4 of them flying. they were making turns at 90 degrees or less at speeds faster than any jets we were doing ops with the carrier we were escorting. these lights would hoover then dart off at high rates of speed make turns in a triangle formation. when i first saw them i thought they were from our carrier ranger, that was in front of us.The lights were small but moving at such high rates of speed i knew they were not any thing we had.When i reported the objects the officer of the deck came out to verify my sighting i was told it would not be logged in the ships official log book that everything is logged.He (ood) told me it was not ufos but venus. the fantail and starboard watch confirmed my sighting. i lost view of the lights when i had to take up my position at the helm.
content.summary: On watch on uss berkeley ddg15 observed 3-4 lights behind us,making turn and speeds never  seen before cob would not let be logged.

content.detailedDescription: I felt as though i was being watched, i investigate and see what appeared to be a shadow at my kitchen window. i then go out back door and see the craft in a field behind my home and in a flash i am somewhere else communicating with three unknown beings warning me that if humanity does not lay down nuclear arms that we would suffer as a whole. then there was a flash and i was back at my back door and craft was gone.
content.summary: Contact warning of nuclear future

content.detailedDescription: Went outside in back of my apartment between 12:30am and 1:15am. saw a movement to my right. saw dark black square object with red running lights gliding northward over apt next to me. i turned to the south and looked in the sky. i immediately saw 8 items with the same running lights. ever since then, i see them with light blue and white running lights. i concentrate my view on them and they quickly float away to hide. they think you can not see them behind power lines. they usually try to hide at treetops. they follow every plane or copter. they have lights to imitate planes and copters at the front, but turn them off when spotted. hover close to buildings late at night.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Two years ago i reported seeing ships in sky every day and night. they are still there.

content.detailedDescription: Was flying home to florida i was looking out window when a beachball sized white solid ball traveled in a straight line in the opposite direction 20 feet off wing of plane and slightly below.
content.summary: Was flying home to florida i was looking out window when a beachball sized white solid ball traveled in a straight line in the opposite direction 20 feet off wing of plane and slightly below.

content.detailedDescription: Was at work. when i was drive in the stree. ufo.Funny looking light flying in the cloud. i knew it was not anything i have ever seen. i chased it down the streets. it then turned so fast. headed south. turned to a solid blue orb.I got photo of it. and then it disapeared.
content.summary: I  saw this light in the sky. flying out of the clouds. it turned. i chased it photos it. followed it. and it disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: On november 14 2015 my trail cam took 11 pictures of 3 lights at different levels. then on january 21 2016 it captures 3 beams of light coming from behind the camera shining where the 3 lights were the first time. i have no idea what the lights are their isn't anything within a mile of the camera
content.summary: Pictures of lights on trail cam

content.detailedDescription: The year was 2000. i was the passenger in a pick up truck. we were about mid way between jamestown, new york and altoona, pennsylvanina. it was approximatly 8pm. it was a couple weeks before thanksgiving and it was fairly cold outside. i was looking around because i was bored. i looked up and saw a strange shadow in the sky. i asked the driver to pull over. i got out of the truck and i saw it fully. it was very large and stationary. the underside was completely black except for four lights just inwards of the four points. it was diamond shaped. i could see it because the night sky around it was brighter than the bottom of it. i couldn't guess at the altitude. we got back in the truck and started traveling again. the craft seemed to be keeping pace with us. after  awhile it just seemed to dissappear. i had no idea what the craft could be except a u.F.O. i didn't become upset because i got no indication that the craft knew that we were there.
content.summary: It had 4 lights. each just inwards of each point

content.detailedDescription: First week in april at about 5:00am i was out with my dogs and watching the stars, looking for satellite which always move east. i was watching what i thought was a plane, but there were no blinking lights, just a solid light moving east by southeast.  after about 10 seconds, the small light brightened to 10 times it original size, in a glowing ball,for about 3 seconds, then returned to the original light shape and continued on the same path. the light appeared to stop, glowed 10 times the original size again and then made an immediate 90* left turn and was visible for 1 to 2 seconds and the object disappeared moving several times the original speed and was gone. i don't believe in things i don't see. but i have seen strange things before in the sky and shrug them off. this object took my breath away. i am amazed at stars and satellites, but this was like nothing else i have ever seen. i watch "mufon files" and that caused me to contact you and report this.
content.summary: Moving solid light. britened to a glow, dimmed, britened again then 90* turn left and flashed away

content.detailedDescription: On november 14 2015 my trail cam took 11 pictures of 3 lights at different levels. then on january 21 2016 it captures 3 beams of light coming from behind the camera shining where the 3 lights were the first time. i have no idea what the lights are their isn't anything within a mile of the camera
content.summary: Pictures of lights on trail cam

content.detailedDescription: I was in first grade so i failed the first so taking it second time so i was approx 7 it's was early 80s i believe 1981 i went to bed so it's 8 or 8:30 i don't remember the day but my dad n step mom were still awake i believe and  we lived in alameda ca i can't remember the street near lincoln park there and well i looked out my bedroom window it's dark outside and i see this huge object saucer shape but enormous above very large trees as if i was looking up at city lights it was still i could see the circle shape as i'm looking up from my window it had some lights flash blink i became afraid like what if it gets me i hid i under my covers so afraid i couldn't speak or move for a minute then i decided to be brace and take another look it was gone the sky was black but for a few stars it was gone i told my dad he laughed at me like kids have such big imaginations then on the news that morning sittings were reported crazy i said dad see and they shrugged it off as probably military training i never believed that it was not like anything we had or have today. i only told a few of my closest friends they humored me like agreed probly something else is out there besides us and another friend said maybe i was young and my eyes played tricks on me i let it go for years til i saw a movie i forgot what it was called made in the 2000s early but it made me remember i still think something was there and then in2014 i got a job at an aerospace company and met a co worker we were all talking about the possibility of other life i told my story to a few people who were working in the room with me and co worker jerome had said approx same time frame he and two friends were in vallejo ca but their siting was braid daylight he said they saw it fly n hover different than mine but same time frame he was 14 i said how lucky you are to have 2 friends see it with you thank you jerome i said i don't feel crazy anymore suck a relief i wasn't the only one i know something was there i never forgot just the little details i and not certain the exact month i believe it was fall time .Thankyou for letting me share i'm 44 now this has never stopped bothering me.
content.summary: I was in first grade saw it outside my bedroom window it's approx 1981 it was there and large  saucer like as if i was looking up at city lights i was afraid hid under my covers then i looked back it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in a pick-up truck going to photograph a friend on her quad 4x4 at a local sand pit and noticed wonderful clouds to photograph complimented with a setting sun just as we were outside of town. i did not notice the object till after i came home to process that evening's photographs.  at around the 7-8pm location on this one photograph i noticed an aberration not evident on the images before or after this image.  i did check my camera also for any dirt or smudge on the lens, inside mirror & sensor of digital camera (canon 7d). it was rectangular and somewhat blurred shape (brownish/black w/apparent clear heat trail.

my camera settings were in manual at f11 & 1/250 sec. iso auto because of the brightness of the sky and setting sun.
content.summary: Blurred rectangular shape (brownish/black w/apparent clear heat trail.

content.detailedDescription: We were probably 13/14 saw silver cigar shaped object moving very slowly in a clear sunlit sky. seemed to stop and come toward us in a country hayfield hollis nh. we were so upset ran to house 1/4 mile away loaded all the guns we had and hid in the basement
content.summary: Silver cigar shape no windows no exhaust thought it was blimp due to lack of speed difficult to tell size or distace sky clear

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime during the early to late eighties (1984?) i was living in amityville, ny which is on the south shore of long island. i was in my bedroom on the lower floor of my house watching tv with my fiance. i was sitting in a chair, facing a large window and the tv was on to my right. my fiance was in the bed in front of me to my left. we both had a clear view of the tv. suddenly, i noticed that the sky outside was lit up like it was broad daylight and the tv quickly lost it's transmission and the screen became very "snowy"

i looked at the tv and the picture of what we were watching was replaced with what looked like the interior of a "spaceship". there was a wall of drawers (like those in a hospital morgue) and one of them opened. the drawer came out with a man in a silver suit (with no insignia or patches) lying down on it. he had what looked like dark glasses on his face. he sat up and looked around slowly. after a few seconds...The snowy tv screen cleared up and went back to the tv program that we were watching. 

during the entire incident, i was pointing at the tv screen, trying to say something but was unable to speak. my fiance was looking at me and saying: "what the hell is wrong with you?" i asked him if he saw what had just happened on the tv, but he said that he hadn't seen anything. 
the next day, one of my friends told me that there might have been a ufo sighting in the area. 

i want to confirm this sighting to make sure that i am not crazy and did see what i saw, even though my fiance says he did not see it. because i think i may have been abducted at some point a few years after that incident. i have unexplained marks and reactions in my skin that i cannot explain where they came from. i hear high pitched sounds and experience burning sensations at certain points under my skin (as if something may have been implanted.) 

please help me
content.summary: Ufo interrupts tv transmission

content.detailedDescription: Was riding in a car down lincoln lake rd between belding and lowell mi. it was very late one evening in july 1993 when i was just mesmerized and staring peacefully at this object that was hovering and possibly keeping pace with us... it had lights of various colors that pulsated. looked to be either triangle or chevron. like i said it was very late and dark. this was rural area so no ambient street lights and very little light pollution. i am not positive how long i stared at it, but i was at peace, relaxed and not afraid. i remember that i was going to ask my boyfriend who was driving something. i don't ever remember actually talking but he answered me. this happened constantly after the event. it's like we could read each other minds. i was going to ask him also if he was seeing this object, never got a chance. but any way i looked over to my boyfriend and looked back real quick to the object speeding off and disappearing like a flash. it was gone. it didn't really register till after the fact what i saw. to this day, i can not get it out of my head.
content.summary: Riding in car, staring out window and just saw this object. watched it hovering and possibly keeping pace with car, till it took off like a shot.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to smoke cigarette, heard hum looked up and saw 4 lights triangle shape 1 in the middle.Grabbed my binoculars off table by the door, clear night and could not see stars between lights. i looked at middle light it was not a regular light it was a cylinder shape about 15 feet high with a handrail at the top all bright white there was also a person or being dressed in white standing at the handrail,pulled binoculars away from my eyes said what the --- put the binoculars back up but angle was gone so i was not looking straight up and it looked like a light again. the triangle object turned west to south and went over the mountains
content.summary: Triangle shaped middle light was tube about 15 feet high with handrail all white. someone ? dressed in white by handrail
